column4: hi all, I just upgraded my cpu from an old sempron to an athlon x2.  Is there a way to tell ubuntu to upgrade everything to a 64 bit progs. libraries, etc, or am i going to be forced to reinstall ubuntu?
you have to reinstall, but unless you really need to use 64bit its probably not owrth the effort
and scguy318, I only have 2 gigs, but it's a mysql server under heavy use, do you think there won't be much difference if I'm not addressing > 4G
